channel.title: [PI] Clicking objects to reveal object ID an coords
channel.description:
Hi, My server used to display a message in the chat to owners of my server if they clicked on an object, I'm trying to get stairs to work but I can't get the coords due to it not telling me once I have clicked. Is there any way I could get it to work, or where can I find the code to see whats wrong?
Thanks, Gergy. Yes, I am player-rights=3
